alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 7:47AM EST until February 27 at 7:39PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding threatens low lying roads and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 22.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The river crested at 24.6 feet Friday evening and is now falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 2 PM this afternoon.
